add_library(Son32 SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(Son32 PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/"
        IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/son32.dll"
        IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/son32.lib"
)
file(COPY son32.dll DESTINATION "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
